span.span: Known Food Service Sites Open During School Closures/Sitios de Distribución de Alimentos Funcionando Durante el Cierre Escolar

div.h1: Known Food Service Sites Open During School Closures/Sitios de Distribución de Alimentos Funcionando Durante el Cierre Escolar

div.p: Any child 18 or younger can go to any school site providing meals and receive food during this period of school closures due to COVID-19.

Below are the food service sites confirmed by the San Diego County Office of Education, where students will be provided meals during the school closures. This page is updated frequently with new information.
Please confirm location and services with your specific school or district. Our school finder tool can help you find contact information quickly.
In addition to the school district resources, check out the additional community resources on the right hand side of this page that also provide food assistance to families.

p.em: Cualquier niño de 18 años o menor puede ir a cualquier sitio escolar que esté distribuyendo alimentos y recibir comida durante el periodo de cierre escolar debido al COVID-19.

La lista a continuación incluye los sitios de distribución de alimentos, confirmados por la Oficina de Educación del Condado de San Diego, que están haciendo entrega de alimentos por el cierre escolar. Esta página se actualiza conforme sale información nueva.
Favor de confirmar la dirección y los servicios con su escuela o distrito particular. Nuestra
puede ayudarle a localizar rápidamente la información de contacto.

Además de los recursos en los distritos escolares, puede consultar los enlaces en la parte derecha de esta página que lo llevan a varias organizaciones de la comunidad que también tienen repartición de alimentos para familias.

hr.p: Grab and go meals for students are available for pick up on Mondays from 11 a.m. to noon at Boulder Oaks Elementary School (2320 Tavern Rd. Alpine CA 91910). We will provide a week's worth of meals every Monday.

p.i: Hay entrega de comida para recoger y llevar cada lunes de 11 a.m. a 12 p.m. en la escuela Boulder Oaks Elementary School (2320 Tavern Rd. Alpine CA 91910). Se entrega suficiente comida para una semana cada lunes.

hr.p: The Fallbrook Union Elementary and Fallbrook Union High School Districts have extended their child nutrition services to Bonsall students. See the sections for those districts below.

em.em: Los estudiantes del distrito de Bonsall pueden hacer uso de los servicios de entrega de comida de los distritos de Fallbrook Union Elementary y Fallbrook Union High School. Vea abajo las secciones para esos distritos.

hr.p: Pick-up meals are available at Borrego Springs Elementary School (315 Palm Canyon Dr, Borrego Springs, CA 92004), from 8:15 a.m. to 11 a.m.
The district will also be delivering food items to the following areas (times may vary by 10 minutes):

p.em: Hay entrega de comida para recoger y llevar en
orrego Springs Elementary School (1
315 Palm Canyon Dr, Borrego Springs, CA 92004), de 8:15 a.m. a 11 a.m.
El distrito también estará entregando alimentos en los lugares siguientes (el tiempo indicado puede variar por 10 minutos):

ul.li: Ocotillo Wells (Oasis) at 10 a.m.
Santiago Estates at 10:45 a.m.
El Rancho at 11 a.m.

hr.p: Cajon Valley Union School District is conducting drive-thru/walk-up distribution of daily meals, free to all children 18 years and younger. Children will need to be present to receive meals, and each child may take one meal bag (including one lunch and one breakfast for the following day). All food will be consumed off site. Meal distribution times for all locations listed below are weekdays from 11 a.m. to 1 p.m.

p.em:
El distrito Cajon Valley Union School District tiene entrega de alimentos sin costo para cualquier niño de 18 años de edad o menor. Los niños deben de estar presentes para recibir la comida, y cada niño puede recibir una bolsa (que incluye un almuerzo y un desayuno para el próximo día.)
Todos los alimentos deben ser consumidos fuera del sitio. El horario es de lunes a viernes, de 11 a.m. a 1 p.m. en los lugares siguientes.

ul.li: Anza Elementary - 1005 S Anza St, El Cajon, CA 92020
Bostonia Language Academy - 1390 Broadway, El Cajon, CA 92021
Cajon Valley Middle School - 550 E Park Ave, El Cajon, CA 92020
Chase Elementary - 195 E. Chase Avenue El Cajon, CA 92020
Emerald Middle School - 1221 Emerald Ave, El Cajon, CA 92020
Flying Hills Elementary - 1251 Finch St, El Cajon, CA 92020
Greenfield Middle School - 1495 Greenfield Dr, El Cajon, CA 92020
Johnson Elementary - 500 W Madison Ave, El Cajon, CA 92020
Lexington Elementary - 1145 Redwood Ave, El Cajon, CA 92019
Madison Elementary - 1615 E Madison Ave, El Cajon, CA 92019
Magnolia Elementary - 650 Greenfield Dr, El Cajon, CA 92021
Meridian Elementary - 651 S 3rd St, El Cajon, CA 92019
Montgomery Middle School - 1570 Melody Ln, El Cajon, CA 92019
Naranca Elementary - 1030 Naranca Ave, El Cajon, CA 92021
Rios Elementary - 14314 Rios Canyon Rd, El Cajon, CA 92021
WD Hall Elementary - 1376 Pepper Dr, El Cajon, CA 92021

div.p: "Grab-and-go" lunch distribution is available from 11:30 am to 1 pm. Monday through Friday at the parking lot of Carlsbad Village Academy/Carlsbad High School (3557 Lancer Way, Carlsbad, California 92008).

p.i: Hay entrega de almuerzo para recoger y llevar de 11:30 a.m. a 1 p.m de lunes a viernes en el estacionamiento de Carlsbad Village Academy/Carlsbad High School (3557 Lancer Way, Carlsbad, California 92008) .

div.p: Daily meal distribution with “grab-and-go" meal service of breakfast and lunch begins at 10 a.m. until all bags are distributed. Meals are intended for our neediest children between the ages of 1 to 18 years.

p.em: La entrega diaria de alimentos para recoger y llevar consistiendo de desayunos y almuerzos empieza a las 10 a.m. hasta agotar cantidades. La comida es para ayudar a nuestros estudiantes más necesitados entre 1 y 18 años de edad.

ul.li: Vista Square Elementary School, 540 G Street, Chula Vista, CA 91910
Rice Elementary School, 915 Fourth Ave., Chula Vista, CA 91911
Juarez-Lincoln Elementary School, 849 Twining Avenue, San Diego, CA 92154
Harborside Elementary School, 681 Naples Street. Chula Vista, CA 91911
Feaster Charter School, 670 Flower St. Chula Vista, CA 91910
Hilltop Drive Elementary School, 30 Murray St., Chula Vista, CA 91910
Loma Verde Elementary School, 1450 Loma Lane, Chula Vista, CA 91911
Montgomery Elementary School, 1601 4th Ave., Chula Vista, CA 91911
Otay Elementary School, 1651 AlbanyAve., Chula Vista, CA 91911

div.p: Meals consisting of five day's worth of breakfast and lunch will be distributed on Mondays only from 11 a.m. to 1 p.m. or until supplies last at the sites below. Meals will be handed out to students age 18 and under.

p.em: La
entrega de desayunos y almuerzos, suficientes para cinco dias, es los lunes únicamente de 11 a.m. a 1 p.m. o hasta agotar cantidades en los sitios a continuación. La comida se entregar
á
a estudiantes de 18 a
ñ
os o menores.

ul.li: Village Elementary School - 600 6th St. (distribution on H Street), Coronado, CA 92118
Silver Strand Elementary School -1350 Leyte Rd.,Coronado, CA 92118

span.style: font-family:"segoe ui", segoe, tahoma, helvetica, arial, sans-serif;font-size:15px;font-weight:bold;

div.p: "Grab- and-go" breakfast and lunch distribution with enough food for multiple days will take place on Mondays and Wednesdays from 11 a.m. to noon at Ocean Knoll Elementary School (910 Melba Rd, Encinitas, CA 92024).

p.em: La entrega de desayuno y almuerzo para varios días a la vez será los lunes y miércoles de 11 a.m. a 12 p.m. en Ocean Knoll Elementary School (910 Melba Rd, Encinitas, CA 92024).

div.h4: Escondido Union Elementary and Escondido Union High school districts

div.p: The free to-go meal distribution provided by EUSD and EUHSD will continue until schools reopen. Meals are distributed from 11 a.m. to noon Monday through Friday at the locations below. Families are asked to go to the school site closest to their home. Meals will be provided to any child age 18 or younger. The child must be present to receive the meal.

div.em: La entrega de alimentos gratis para llevar proporcionada por los distritos de EUSD y EUHSD continuará durante el cierre escolar. La entrega de comida es de 11 a.m. a 12 p.m. de lunes a viernes en los sitios enlistados abajo.
Se le pide a las familias que vayan al sitio más cercano a su hogar. Se entregarán alimentos a cualquier niño de 18 años o menor y el menor debe estar presente para recibir la comida.

ul.li: Central Elementary - 122 West 4th Ave., Escondido
Juniper Elementary - 1809 S. Juniper St., Escondido
Rock Springs Elementary - 1155 Deodar Rd., Escondido
Farr Elementary - 933 Farr Ave. Escondido
Oak Hill Elementary - 1820 Oak Hill Dr., Escondido
Glen View Elementary - 2201 E. Mission Ave., Escondido
Del Dios Academy - 1400 W. 9th Ave., Escondido
Mission Middle School - 939 E. Mission Ave., Escondido
Escondido High School - 1535 N. Broadway, Escondido
Orange Glen High School - 2200 Glenridge Rd., Escondido
San Pasqual High School - 3300 Bear Valley Parkway, Escondido

hr.p: Multi-meal packs are available on Mondays (with food for 2 days) and Wednesdays (with food for 3 days) from 11 a.m. to 1 p.m. at the sites below. Meals are available to all children ages 2 to 18.

p.em: Hay entrega de comida, suficiente para varios dias, los lunes (comida para 2 días) y miércoles (comida para 3 días) de 11 a.m. a 1 p.m. en estos sitios. La comida es para todo niño de 2 a 18 años de edad.

ul.li: Maie Ellis Elementary School - 400 W Elder St, Fallbrook, CA 92028
La Paloma Elementary School - 300 Heald Ln, Fallbrook, CA 92028
San Onofre School - 200 Pate Rd, San Clemente, CA 92672
Mary Fay Pendleton Elementary School - 110 Marine Dr, Oceanside, CA 92058
De Luz School House - 40153 De Luz Murrieta Rd., CA 92028 (12 - 1 p.m.)

span.style: font-family:"segoe ui", segoe, tahoma, helvetica, arial, sans-serif;font-size:15px;font-weight:bold;

hr.p: Hot grab and go lunch is being served at Fallbrook Union High School on weekdays from 11 a.m. to 1 p.m. Children must be physically present to receive lunch and breakfast. The district also has buses delivering food to remote areas at designated bus stops. View the lunch drop-off times or check the Fallbrook Union High School District webpage.

p.em: Hay entrega de almuerzo caliente para recoger y llevar en la escuela Fallbrook Union High School de lunes a viernes de 11 a.m. a 1 p.m. Los estudiantes deben estar presentes físicamente para recibir comida y desayundo. El distrito también tiene autobuses entregando comida a zonas lejanas en paradas designadsa. Vea el

a.title: PDF de puntos de entrega de comida

p.em: o consulte la página del distrito de Fallbrook Union High School District.

span.style: font-family:"segoe ui", segoe, tahoma, helvetica, arial, sans-serif;font-size:15px;font-weight:bold;

div.p: Free meals for students are available Monday through Friday from 10:30 a.m. to 12:30 p.m. at the following GUHSD school sites.

p.em: Hay entrega de alimentos gratis para los estudiantes de lunes a viernes de 10:30 a.m. a 12:30 p.m. en los siguientes sitios escolares de GUHSD.

ul.li: Santana High School - 9915 N. Magnolia, Santee
El Cajon Valley High School - 1035 E. Madison Ave., El Cajon
Steele Canyon High School - 12440 Campo Road, Spring Valley
Grossmont High School - 1100 Murray Drive, El Cajon
Mount Miguel High School - 8585 Blossom Lane, Spring Valley
Monte Vista High School - 3230 Sweetwater Springs Blvd., Spring Valley
Helix Charter High School - 7323 University Ave., La Mesa
Liberty Charter High School - 8425 Palm St., Lemon Grove
Literacy First Charter School - 799 E Washington Ave., El Cajon

div.p: The district is conducting drive-through distribution of breakfast and lunch daily through June 10 at the locations and times listed below.

p.em: El distrito está haciendo entrega diaria hasta el 10 de junio de desayunos y almuerzos para recoger y llevar en estos sitios y horarios:

ul.li: Jamul Elementary - 14567 Lyons Valley Rd; 10:30 a.m. - 12:30 p.m.
Pio Pico Campground - 14615 Otay Lakes Rd.; 1 - 2 p.m.
Dulzura Community Center - 1136 Community Building Rd.; 1:45 - 2:15 p.m.

div.h4: Julian Union School District/Julian Union High School District
div.p: Lunch distribution for the community is available from 11:30 a.m. to noon at following sites. Lunch is available to any child 2 to 18 years old.

p.em: Los sitios a continuación ofrecen entrega de alimentos para la comunidad de 11:30 a.m. a 12 p.m. La comida es para cualquier niño de 2 a 18 años de edad.

ul.li: Julian High School - 1656 Hwy 78, Julian
Shelter Valley Community Center - 7217 Great Southern Overland Stage RTE, Julian

li.strong: Mesa Grande "Old Dairy" bus stop/parada de autobus

ul.li: Butterfield Ranch bus stop/parada de autobus (12 - 12:15 p.m.)

div.p: Multi-meal packs with breakfast and lunch are available on Mondays (with food for 2 days) and Wednesdays (with food for 3 days) from 11 a.m. to 1 p.m. at the sites below. .

p.em: Hay entrega de almuerzos y desayunos, suficiente para varios dias, los lunes (comida para 2 días) y miércoles (comida para 3 días) de 11 a.m. a 1 p.m. en estos sitios.

ul.li: Bancroft Elementary School - 8805 Tyler St., Spring Valley, CA 91977
La Mesa Arts Academy - 4200 Parks Avenue, La Mesa, CA 91941
Parkway Middle School - 9009 Park Plaza Drive, La Mesa, CA 91942
Spring Valley Academy - 3900 Conrad Drive, Spring Valley, CA 91977
STEAM Academy - 1001 Leland Street, Spring Valley, CA 91978

div.p: Drive-through meal service will be available from 11:30 a.m. to 12:30 p.m. at Lakeside Union School District Office (12335 Woodside Ave., Lakeside, CA 92040). During this time, you can pick up meals for lunch and breakfast for the following morning.

p.em: Habrá servicio de distribución de alimentos a la ventanilla del vehículo de 11:30 a.m. a 12:30 p.m. en la oficina del distrito escolar Lakeside Union School District (12335 Woodside Ave., Lakeside, CA 92040). Durante estas horas puede recoger almuerzo y el desayuno para el próximo día.

span.style: font-family:"segoe ui", segoe, tahoma, helvetica, arial, sans-serif;font-size:15px;font-weight:bold;

div.p: Bulk meal distribution with drive-through service takes place every Wednesday (with breakfast and lunch for 5 days) from 11:30 a.m. to 12:30 p.m. or until supplies last at the parking lot of Lemon Grove Elementary/Recreation Center (3121 School Lane, Lemon Grove, CA 91945). Children 18 years and under are eligible and must be present to receive meals.

p.em: La entrega de alimentos con servicio al vehículo es cada miércoles (con desayunos y almuerzos para 5 días) de 11:30 a.m. a 12:30 p.m. o hasta agotar cantidades, en el estacionamiento de Lemon Grove Elementary/Recreation Center (3121 School Lane, Lemon Grove, CA 91945). Los niños de 18 años o menores son elegibles y deben estar presentes para recibir alimentos.

span.style: font-family:"segoe ui", segoe, tahoma, helvetica, arial, sans-serif;font-size:15px;font-weight:bold;
font-family:"segoe ui", segoe, tahoma, helvetica, arial, sans-serif;font-size:15px;font-weight:bold;

div.p: Drive-through meal service is available from 11:30 a.m. to 1 p.m., Monday to Friday, at the sites listed below. Students will receive meals for lunch and breakfast for the following morning, and do not need to be present to pick up the food.

p.em: Hay servicio de distribución de alimentos a la ventanilla del vehículo de 11:30 a.m. a 1p.m. de lunes a viernes en los sitios a continuación. Los estudiantes recibirán almuerzo y desayuno para el próximo día, y no necesitan estar presentes para recoger la comida.

ul.li: Mtn. Empire High School - 3305 Buckman Springs Rd., Pine Valley, CA 91962
Campo Elementary - 1654 Buckman Springs Rd., Campo, CA 91906
Pine Valley Middle School - 7454 Pine Blvd., Pine Valley, CA 91962

Potrero Elementary - 24875 Potrero Valley Rd., Potrero, CA 91963

div.p: "Grab-and-go" meal service takes place from 10 a.m. to 12:30 p.m. Monday through Friday at Las Palmas Elementary School (1900 E. 18th Street, National City, CA 91950). Food is for children 18 and under.

p.em: La entrega de alimentos para recoger y llevar toma lugar de 10 a.m. a 12:30 p.m. de lunes a viernes en la escuela Las Palmas Elementary School (1900 E. 18th Street, National City, CA 91950). La comida es para los niños de 18 años y menores.

span.style: font-family:"segoe ui", segoe, tahoma, helvetica, arial, sans-serif;font-size:15px;font-weight:bold;

hr.p: Lunch and breakfast for the next day can be picked up at the following locations Tuesdays and Thursdays between 11:30 a.m. to 1 p.m.

p.em: Hay entrega de almuerzo y desayuno para el próximo día los martes y jueves de 11:30 a.m. a 1 p.m. en estos sitios:

span.style: color:#000000;font-family:"open sans", sans-serif;

li.span: Oceanside High School - 1 Pirates Cove Way, Oceanside, CA 92054

span.style: color:#000000;font-family:"open sans", sans-serif;

li.span: North Terrace - 141 Santa Rosa Drive, Oceanside CA 92058

div.p: From 11 a.m. to 1 p.m. Monday through Friday, the district will offer lunch and breakfast together. These meals are free for anyone 18 years or younger in our community or any PUSD transition student 22 years or younger, but we ask that students needing meals be physically present for an accurate count. The meals will be available at the following 12 centralized school sites; please drive up or walk up to the site nearest you:

p.em: De 11 a.m. a 1 p.m. de lunes a viernes, el distrito entregará el almuerzo y el desayuno juntos. Esta comida es gratis para cualquier persona de 18 años o menor en nuestra comunidad, o para cualquier estudiante de transición de PUSD de 22 años o menor. Los estudiantes deben estar presentes físicamente para recibir la comida ya que necesitamos llevar un conteo acertado. Los alimentos se entregarán en 12 sitios escolares céntricos. Puede recibir servicio a la ventanilla del vehículo o a pie en el lugar más cercano a usted:

ul.li: Del Norte High School (16601 Nighthawk Lane, San Diego, CA 92127)
Los Penasquitos Elementary School (14125 Cuca St., San Diego CA 92129)
Meadowbrook Middle School (12320 Meadowbrook Lane, Poway, CA 92064)
Midland Elementary School (13910 Midland Road, Poway, CA 92064)
Mt. Carmel High School (9550 Carmel Mountain Road, San Diego, CA 92129)
Pomerado Elementary School (12321 Ninth Street, Poway CA 92064)
Poway High School (5500 Espola Rd, Poway, CA 92064)
Rancho Bernardo High School (13010 Paseo Lucido, San Diego CA 92128)
Twin Peaks Middle School (14640 Tierra Bonita Road, Poway, CA 92064)
Valley Elementary School (13000 Bowron Rd, Poway, CA 92064)
Westview High School (13500 Camino Del Sur, San Diego, CA 92129)
Westwood Elementary School (17449 Matinal Rd, San Diego, CA 9127)

div.p: Meals will be served to students from 11 a.m. to 12:30 p.m. at two sites:

p.em: Se entregará comida a los estudiantes de 11 a.m. a 12:30 p.m. en dos sitios:

ul.li: Ramona Elementary - 415 8th St, Ramona, CA 92065 - In the cafeteria
Olive Peirce Middle School - 1521 Hanson Ln, Ramona, CA 92065 - In the bus loop

span.style: font-family:"segoe ui", segoe, tahoma, helvetica, arial, sans-serif;font-size:15px;font-weight:bold;
font-family:"segoe ui", segoe, tahoma, helvetica, arial, sans-serif;font-size:15px;font-weight:bold;

div.p: The Food Service Dept. does drive-thru/walk-up distribution of daily prepared meals. Children need to be present to receive meals, and each child 18 years and younger can take one lunch and one breakfast for the next day. There will be no congregate feeding. All food will be consumed off site. Meal distribution times for all locations are weekdays from 11 a.m. to 1 p.m.

Launch of "7 Meals in 5 Days Plan": Starting on Thursday, April 23, the district will begin serving one extra lunch on Thursdays and Fridays to carry students through the weekend. On Thursday, April 30, an extra breakfast will also be added to the Thursday and Friday meal distributions.

p.em: El Departamento de Servicios de Alimentos lleva a cabo la entrega de alimentos preparados diariamente con servicio a la ventanilla del vehículo o a pie. Los niños deben de estar presentes para recibir la comida, y cada niño de 18 años o menor puede recibir un almuerzo y un desayuno para el próximo día. No habrá área de comer disponible. Todos los alimentos deben ser consumidos fuera del sitio. El horario de entrega para todos los sitios es de 11 a.m. a 1 p.m. los días de entre semana.

Plan de 7 comidas en 5 días: A partir del jueves 23 de abril, se distribuirá un almuerzo adicional los jueves y viernes para que los estudiantes tengan almuerzos durante el fin de semana. Comenzando el jueves 30 de abril, también se servirá un desayuno adicional en la entrega de alimentos los jueves y viernes.

ul.li: Chollas Mead Elementary - 4525 Market St, San Diego, CA 92102
Clark Middle - 4388 Thorn St, San Diego, CA 92105
Cherokee Point Elementary - 3735 38th St, San Diego, CA 92105

div.h4: San Dieguito Union High School District

div.p: Drive up and walk up meals with breakfast and lunch will be distributed from 11:30 a.m. to 1 p.m. on Tuesdays (with food for 2 days) and Thursdays (with food for 3 days) at the locations below. Children 2-18 years are eligible and must be present to receive meals.

p.em: Se entregarán almuerzos y desayunos con servicio a la ventanilla del vehículo o a pie de 11:30 a.m. a 1 p.m. los martes (comida para 2 días) y jueves (comida para 3 días) en los siguientes sitios. Los niños de 2 -18 años deben estar presentes para recibir alimentos.

ul.li: Earl Warren Middle School - 155 Stevens Ave, Solana Beach, CA 92075
San Dieguito Academy - 800 Santa Fe Dr, Encinitas, CA 92024

span.style: font-family:"segoe ui", segoe, tahoma, helvetica, arial, sans-serif;font-size:15px;font-weight:bold;

div.p: "Grab-and-go" meal distribution to anyone 18 years old or younger will be consolidated to the following school sites. Meals may be picked up at each school site from 11 a.m. to 1 p.m. Monday through Friday.

p.em: La entrega de comida para recoger y llevar para cualquier persona de 18 años o menor tomará lugar en los sitios escolares siguientes. Se puede recoger la comida en cada sitio escolar de 11 a.m. a 1 p.m. de lunes a viernes.

ul.li: Joli Ann Elemenatry - 653 Poinsettia Ave., Vista
Richland Elementary - 910 Borden Rd., San Marcos
San Marcos Elementary - 1 Tiger Way, San Marcos
La Mirada Academy - 3697 La Mirada Dr., San Marcos
San Elijo Middle - 1600 Schoolhouse Way, San Marcos
San Marcos Middle - 650 West Mission Rd., San Marcos
Mission Hills High - 1 Mission Hills Ct., San Marcos
San Marcos High - 1615 San Marcos Blvd., San Marcos

span.style: font-family:"segoe ui", segoe, tahoma, helvetica, arial, sans-serif;font-size:15px;font-weight:bold;

div.p: “Grab-and-go" meal service with breakfast and lunch will be distributed once a week on Wednesdays at the site below. The hours are 11:30 a.m. to 1 p.m. or until supplies last.

p.em: Se entregarán almuerzos y desayunos para recoger y llevar una vez por semana los miércoles en el sitio enlistado abajo. Las horas de entrega son de 11:30 a.m. a 1 p.m. o hasta agotar cantidades.

ul.li: La Mirada Elementary School - 222 Avenida De La Madrid, San Ysidro, CA 92173

div.p: Meals are available for pick up starting at 11 a.m. Monday through Friday at the sites below. Please note each site has a different closing time:

p.em: Hay entrega de comida para recoger y llevar a las 11 a.m. de lunes a viernes en los sitios siguientes. Cada sitio tiene diferente hora de cierre.

ul.li: District office/Oficina del distrito - 9880 Riverwalk Dr, Santee; until 1 p.m. / hasta la 1 p.m.
PRIDE Academy - 9303 Prospect Ave., Santee; until 12:30 p.m. / hasta las 12:30 p.m.

div.p: South Bay Union School District will provide bulk meals (5 breakfasts and 5 lunches) for children age 18 and younger on Mondays from 11 a.m. to 1 p.m. at the District Warehouse, (1111 Saturn Blvd., San Diego, CA 92514).

p.em: El distrito de South Bay Union School District proporcionará comida en cantidades para cinco días (5 desayunos y 5 almuerzos) a los niños de 18 años o menores, los lunes de 11 a.m. a 1 p.m. en la bodega del distrito,
1111 Saturn Blvd., San Diego, CA 92514).

div.p: Lunch distribution for the community is available from 11:30 a.m. to noon at following sites. Lunch is available to any child 2 to 18 years old.

p.em: Los sitios a continuación ofrecen entrega de alimentos para la comunidad de 11:30 a.m. a 12 p.m. La comida es para cualquier niño de 2 a 18 años de edad

ul.li: Julian High School - 1656 Hwy 78, Julian
Shelter Valley Community Center - 7217 Great Southern Overland Stage RTE, Julian

li.strong: Mesa Grande "Old Dairy" bus stop/parada de autobus

ul.li: Butterfield Ranch bus stop/parada de autobus (12:15 -12:30 p.m.)

div.p: Meal distribution is every Tuesday in April from 11 a.m. to 1 p.m. Each of the locations below will provide five days' worth of breakfast and lunch for children 2 to 18 years old.
The child does not need to be present to receive the meals. Parents will be asked to confirm that they have a child at home.

p.em: La entrega de comida es cada martes durante el mes de abril de 11 a.m. a 1 p.m. Cada uno de los sitios a continuación
entregará almuerzos y desayunos para cinco días a niños de 2 a 18 años.
El estudiante no tiene que estar presente para recibir la comida. Se le pedirá a los padres que confirmen que hay un niño en el hogar.

ul.li: Chula Vista Middle – 515 5th Ave., Chula Vista, CA 91910
Montgomery Middle – 1051 Picador Blvd., San Diego, CA 92154
National City Middle – 1701 D Ave., National City, CA 91950
Southwest Middle – 2710 Iris Ave., San Diego, CA 92154
Hilltop High – 555 Claire Ave., Chula Vista, CA 91910
Southwest High – 1685 Hollister St., San Diego, CA 92154
Bonita Vista- 650 Otay Lakes Rd. Chula Vista, CA 9110
Castle Park High - 1395 Hilltop Drive, Chula Vista, CA 91911

li.span: hula Vista High - 820 Fourth Ave., Chula Vista CA 91910

ul.li: Eastlake High - 1120 Eastlake Parkway, Chula Vista, CA 9115
Granger Jr. High - 2101 Granger Ave., National City, CA 91950
Mar Vista Academy - 1267 Thermal Ave., San Diego CA 92154
Otay Ranch High - 1250 Olympic Parkway, Chula Vista, CA 91913
San Ysidro High - 5353 Airway Road, San Diego, CA 92154
Sweetwater High School - 2900 Highland Ave., National City, CA 91950

span.style: font-family:"segoe ui", segoe, tahoma, helvetica, arial, sans-serif;font-size:15px;font-weight:bold;
font-family:"segoe ui", segoe, tahoma, helvetica, arial, sans-serif;font-size:15px;font-weight:bold;

div.p: Lunch will be available from 11 a.m. to 1 p.m. at Vallecitos Elementary School (5211 5th St, Fallbrook, CA 92028).

p.em: Entrega de almuerzo de 11 a.m. a 1 p.m. en la escuela Vallecitos Elementary School (5211 5th St, Fallbrook, CA 92028).

span.style: font-family:"segoe ui", segoe, tahoma, helvetica, arial, sans-serif;font-size:15px;font-weight:bold;

div.p: Grab-and-go sack lunches and breakfasts will be provided free to anyone 18 or younger for the duration of the school closure. Meal distribution will be from noon to 1 p.m. on Mondays and Thursdays at the locations below. Starting Thursday, April 30, meals for the weekend will also be handed out on Thursdays.

p.em: Habrá entrega de almuerzos y desayunos gratuitos para recoger y llevar para cualquier persona de 18 años o menor durante el cierre escolar. El servicio de entrega de alimentos será de 12 a 1 p.m. los lunes y jueves en los lugares siguientes. A partir del jueves 30 de abril, también se entregarán los jueves comidas para el fin de semana.

ul.li: Pauma School, 33158 Cole Grade Road, Pauma Valley
Valley Center Elementary School, 28751 Cole Grade Road, Valley Center
Valley Center Middle School, 28102 N. Lake Wohlford Road, Valley Center

span.style: font-family:"segoe ui", segoe, tahoma, helvetica, arial, sans-serif;font-size:15px;font-weight:bold;

hr.p: Meals consisting of five days of breakfast and lunch will be distributed on Wednesdays only from 10:30 a.m. to 12:30 p.m. at the locations below. Meals are available for children 18 and under, and the child must be present to receive food. Please bring a vehicle or a way to transport the food.

p.em: Hay entrega de comida consistiendo de cinco días de desayunos y almuerzos los miércoles únicamente de 10:30 a.m. a 12:30 p.m. en los sitios a continuación. La comida es para niños de 18 años o menores, y cada niño debe estar presente para recibirla. Favor de traer vehículo u otra manera de transportar la comida.

ul.li: Roosevelt Middle School - 850 Sagewood Dr., Oceanside, CA 92057
Vista Adult Transition Center (VATC) - 325 E Bobier Dr., Vista, CA 92084
Grapevine Elementary - 630 Grapevine Rd., Vista, CA 92083
Foothill Oak Elementary -1370 Oak Dr., Vista, CA 92084
Rancho Buena Vista High School - 601 Longhorn Dr., Vista, CA 92081

hr.div: The charter schools listed below have informed us they are providing meal distribution. Click on each school name to visit their website for details, or see list of individual schools below that have provided information.
Additionally, the California Charter Schools Association has compiled a map of charter schools offering meal services across the state. View the map and search for San Diego County.

div.em: Las escuelas charter en la lista a continuación nos han informado que están haciendo entrega de alimentos. Pulse el nombre de la escuela para ver detalles en su página de internet, o consulte la lista de escuelas individuales que han proporcionado información.

div.div: Adicionalmente, la Asociación de Escuelas Charter de California tiene un mapa de escuelas charter que tienen entrega de alimentos en todo el estado. Vea el mapa y realize una búsqueda para el Condado de San Diego.

ul.li: Integrity Charter School (South San Diego County)
Springs Charter School (Multiple locations/varias ubicaciones)
Literacy First Charter School (East County - see under GUHSD above / ver bajo GUHSD arriba)
Helix Charter High School (East County - see under GUHSD above / ver bajo GUHSD arriba)
Epiphany Prep Charter School (Escondido)
Bella Mente Academies (Vista)
Guajome Schools (Vista)
JCS (San Diego County at various sites/Condado de San Diego, varias ubicaciones)
Urban Discovery Academy (San Diego )

div.h4: Albert Einstein Academy Charter Middle School
div.p: Breakfast and lunch are served together from 10 to noon, Monday through Friday, at the school (458 26th Street, San Diego, CA 92102). Drive-thru or walk-up meal distribution is behind the school, enter through alley.

p.em: Se sirven desayunos y almuerzos al mismo tiempo de 10 a.m. a 12 p.m., de lunes a viernes,
(458 26th Street, San Diego, CA 92102). La entrega de alimentos con servicio a la ventanilla del vehículo o a pie es en la parte de atrás de la escuela, entrar por el callejón.

span.style: font-family:"segoe ui", segoe, tahoma, helvetica, arial, sans-serif;

h4.span: Epiphany Prep School of San Diego

div.div: "Grab and go" meals consisting of breakfast, lunch, and supper will be available for pick up from 6:30 to 10 a.m. at the school (725 N Escondido Blvd, Escondido, CA 92025). The child must be present to receive food.

div.em: Hay entrega de alimentos para llevar, que incluyen desayuno, almuerzo, y merienda, de 6:30 a 10 a.m. en la escuela, (725 N Escondido Blvd, Escondido, CA 92025). El menor debe estar presente para recibir la comida.

span.style: font-family:"segoe ui", segoe, tahoma, helvetica, arial, sans-serif;font-size:15px;font-weight:bold;
font-family:"segoe ui", segoe, tahoma, helvetica, arial, sans-serif;font-size:15px;font-weight:bold;

div.p: Meals consisting of a week's worth of breakfast and lunch are on Mondays only from 11 a.m. to 1 p.m. at the sites below. Meals will be handed out in a drive-through fashion in the school parking lot to all students age 18 and under, and the child must be present to receive food.

p.em: Hay
entrega de desayunos y almuerzos, suficientes para una semana, los lunes únicamente de 11 a.m. a 1 p.m. en los sitios a continuación. La comida se entregar
á
con servicio al veh
ículo en el estacionamiento de la escuela, a estudiantes de 18 a
ñ
os o menores, y cada ni
ñ
o debe estar presente para recibir comida.

ul.li: High Tech Middle - 2359 Truxtun Rd., San Diego, CA 92106
High Tech High Chula Vista - 1945 Discovery Falls Dr., Chula Vista, CA 91915

div.p: "Grab-and-go" lunch distribution consisting of five days' worth of meals is available from 11:30 a.m. to 12:30 p.m. on Mondays at the Afghan Community Islamic Center parking lot (3333 Sandrock Rd., San Diego, CA 92123).

p.em: Hay entrega de almuerzos para recoger y llevar, suficientes para cinco días, de 11:30 a.m. a 12:30 p.m. los lunes
en el estacionamiento del Afghan Community Islamic Center (3333 Sandrock Rd., San Diego, CA 92123).

div.p: "Grab-and-go" breakfast and lunch is available for any child 2 to 18 years old from 10 a.m. to 12:30 p.m. on Monday, Wednesday, and Friday at the school (4070 Mission Ave., Oceanside, CA 92057). The child must be present to receive food.

p.em: Hay entrega de desayunos y almuerzos para recoger y llevar a todo niño de 2 a 18 años de edad, de 10 a.m. a 12:30 p.m., el lunes, miércoles, y viernes,
(4070 Mission Ave., Oceanside, CA 92057). El niño debe estar presente para recibir la comida.
